description: Upward Mobility presents our NREMT EMT I/85 Exam Prep app for Palm webOS.  This module contains a targeted curriculum of 298 questions designed to include all necessary content areas required for an EMT Intermediate.  All questions were written exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who are certified EMTs  with a thorough and up-to-date knowledge of EMS material.  ||  This app provides nearly three hundred questions paired with clear, thorough explanations to reinforce comprehension of the material, and to bridge the gap between your basic EMT knowledge and practical patient application.  It covers all topics on the National Registry of Emergency Medical Technicians (NREMT) EMT-I85 Cognitive Exam: Airway and Breathing, Cardiology, Trauma, Medical, Obstetrics and Pediatrics, and EMS Operations. ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
